Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier minor fire on the tracks at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier minor fire on the tracks at Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
